meanings.definition: Having a strong, pungent flavor or aroma, often from the presence of spices.
meanings.sent1: The spicy curry filled the room with its strong smell.
meanings.sent2: I love the spicy taste of hot peppers in my food.
meanings.sent3: The spicy salsa danced on my taste buds, making me crave more.
meanings.sent4: Her spicy personality added flavor to the party.
meanings.sent5: The spicy aroma of cinnamon lingered in the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Producing a burning sensation on the tongue or in the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The spicy chili sauce made my mouth burn.
meanings.sent2: The spicy wings left a fiery sensation in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: His spicy prank with hot sauce made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The spicy salsa set my taste buds on fire.
meanings.sent5: The spicy peppers ignited a fiery feeling in my mouth.

meanings.definition: Exciting or stimulating, especially in a provocative or titillating way.
meanings.sent1: The spicy movie kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent2: Her spicy stories always captivate the audience.
meanings.sent3: The spicy gossip spread like wildfire in the office.
meanings.sent4: His spicy jokes added a thrilling element to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The spicy novel was full of unexpected twists and turns.
